00013 typedef struct liqcelleventargs
00014 {
00015         // the event context passed to objects per paint event
00016         liqcell *self;
00017 }
00018         liqcelleventargs;

00021 typedef struct liqcellfiltereventargs
00022 {
00023         // the event context passed to objects per filter event
00024         int   filterinuse;              // 0 no filter in effect, 1 filter in use
00025         char *searchterm;               // normal search pattern, may include a tokensized breakdown of the search below
00026         char *searchtags;               // list of tags to include
00027         
00028         int   resultoutof;              // number of possible units
00029         int   resultshown;              // number actually remaining visible
00030 }
00031         liqcellfiltereventargs;

00035 typedef struct liqcellclickeventargs
00036 {
00037         // the event context passed to objects per paint event
00038         liqcell *newdialogtoopen;
00039         int newdialogshowmode;          // 0 zoom to selection, 1 slide in out
00040 }
00041         liqcellclickeventargs;

00044 typedef struct liqcellpainteventargs
00045 {
00046         // the event context passed to objects per paint event
00047 
00048         //liqcliprect *cr;
00049         vgraph *graph;
00050         int         ox;                         // where you should consider top left: 0,0
00051         int         oy;
00052         int         mx;                         // your actual available dimensions in pixel sizes
00053         int         my;                         // this should have followed a setting on the cell itself and the users preferences
00054         int         runfast;            // set to 1 to indicate in a runfast session, the render engine will return asap to give you another frame
00055 }
00056         liqcellpainteventargs;

00065         liqcellkeyeventargs;

00069 typedef struct liqcellmouseeventargs
00070 {
00071         // the event context passed to objects per stroke
00072         // privately constructed and managed for you
00073         // to use in a floating section, just adjust by the deltas
00074 
00075         //liqcliprect *cr;
00076         vgraph *graph;
00077 
00078 
00079 
00080 
00081 
00082         liqstroke  *stroke;
00083 
00084         int mcnt;               // count of items
00085 
00086         int msx;                // start item
00087         int msy;
00088         int msz;
00089         unsigned long    mst;
00090 
00091         int mex;                // end item
00092         int mey;
00093         int mez;
00094         unsigned long    met;
00095 
00096         int mdx;                // item deltas since last invocation
00097         int mdy;
00098         int mdz;
00099         unsigned long    mdt;
00100 
00101         liqcell *hit;
00102

00105 
00106 }
